mapper.select: SELECT S.SLOT_ID AS COL1 ,CASE WHEN S.TYPE = 'A' THEN '자동완성' WHEN S.TYPE = 'MS' THEN '모바일 통합 검색' WHEN S.TYPE = 'R' THEN '연관검색어' END AS COL2 ,S.SEARCH_KW AS COL3 ,S.EXPOSE_KW AS COL4 ,CASE WHEN CONCAT(S.RANKING, '/', S.RANK_TOT) = '0/0' THEN '*' ELSE CONCAT(S.RANKING, '/', S.RANK_TOT) END AS COL5 ,S.ACCOUNT AS COL6 ,S.CREATED_AT AS COL7 ,S.CREATED_AT AS COL8 ,CASE WHEN S.STATUS = 'A' THEN '정상' ELSE '사용중지' END AS COL9 FROM TB_SLOT S WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SLOT S WHERE S.ACCOUNT = #{account} AND S.TYPE = 'MS' AND S.STATUS = 'A') - IFNULL(U.MOBILE_SEARCH_SLOT_CNT, 0) AS disableMobileSearchSlotCnt , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SLOT S WHERE S.ACCOUNT = #{account} AND S.TYPE = 'A' AND S.STATUS = 'A') - IFNULL(U.AUTO_SLOT_CNT, 0) AS disableAutoSlotCnt , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SLOT S WHERE S.ACCOUNT = #{account} AND S.TYPE = 'R' AND S.STATUS = 'A') - IFNULL(U.REL_SLOT_CNT, 0) AS disableRelSlotCnt FROM TB_USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND U.ACCOUNT = #{account}
